description.value: You designate a single construct within 30 feet that you can see or hear. The construct becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened]{Quickened 1} for 1 minute and is temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours. It can use its additional action only to Stride or Strike.
